title: fix(coinbase): fetchBalance - limit parameter removed for v2
body:
fixes: #21226

repo.name: ccxt
repo.description: A JavaScript / Python / PHP cryptocurrency trading API with support for more than 120 bitcoin/altcoin exchanges

repo.name: ccxt
repo.description: A cryptocurrency trading API with more than 100 exchanges in JavaScript / TypeScript / Python / C# / PHP / Go
